Paragraph: Strong and broad photo - to - current responses were observed in the range from 330 to 780 nm in all of these PSCs , in which the absorption above 650 nm was attributed to the polymer aggregationinduced absorption broadening.

Let's think step by step.

1. The range from 330 to 780 nm: This is a numerical range representing the wavelength of the strong and broad photo-to-current responses observed in the PSCs (Polymer Solar Cells).
2. All of these PSCs: This is a group of Polymer Solar Cells.
3. The absorption above 650 nm: This is a property of the absorption spectrum in the PSCs.
4. The polymer aggregation-induced absorption broadening: This is a property or effect related to the polymer in the PSCs.
